name: Bob's Rampage
description:
This is our first game ever created and it's "finished". It's really short, but offers lots of fun and is kind of great when you're bored. Hope you guys enjoy it!

Bob's Xbox was stolen by his evil brother Browb, so after few nights of raging,destroying furniture & crying he decided to get back what was stolen from him. Help Bob with his adventure of a life time! Fight against clouds, lighters, moustaches with the size of your own body, polished & unpolished butts with wings and finally giant Nicolas Cage's head.

Features:

- 4 levels with unique enemies with different attacks.

- Shop with game currency.

- 1 extra hardcore level with all enemies in it.

- More than 10 minutes of gameplay.

- Support for android.
